      • movementTest

        @Test
void movementTest()
        Tests movement, specifically MovementSystem's processEntity method. Assures that only floors are traversable and an Entity can't move out of map bounds. Initiates combat if possible.

      • initCombatTest

        void initCombatTest(java.util.List<Creature> combatTargets)
